channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.description:

  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED A T THE HAZMAT CAGE, UPON INSPECTION A BOX WAS FOUND INSIDE A BLACK TOTE WITH LIQUID INSIDE. A BOX OF SODIUM HYDROXIDE SOLUTION WAD FOUND INSIDE AND THE BOX WAS TORN. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE.

item.title: Report X-2024061503
item.description:
Report X-2024061503

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-24
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO EXTERNAL CARTON BEING TORN AND WET DURING THE DAY SORT. UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DURING THE TWILIGHT SHIFT 6X1GALLON ((METAL CANS) SUNNYSIDE DENATURED ALCOHOL WITH A LOOSE CAP CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING 1 OUNCE OF SPILLAGE FROM THE CAN. FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2024060701
item.description:
Report X-2024060701

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The spill occurred during twi sort with approximately 1.25 liquid gallons leaked out from 2 of the 4 contents. Only 3 of the 4 contents were brought to the hazmat cage. 1 of the 3 contents was missing approximately 0.25 liquid gallon of its contents. Thet were placed in a lined salvage drum for further instructions on disposition.

item.title: Report X-2024060698
item.description:
Report X-2024060698

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The spilled contents arrived at hazmat on the beginning of day sort. It was noted that the spill was due to a loosed cap on one of the three contents that came in the fiberboard box, one of the contents was missing. Contents were placed in a lined salvage drum. Possible additional inner packaging and cap seals may help with the protection of the contents.

item.title: Report E-2024060519
item.description:
Report E-2024060519

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-07

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-XTJ contacted ERTS to report an unknown product spill believed to be a Class 6.1 poison, impacting the trailer floor. The caller reported opening the trailer and discovering a noxious odor and approximately 3 gallons of liquid material coming from an unknown container, possibly a drum of unknown size and type. ERTS advised the caller to close the trailer and not to interact with the material further.

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATLEY 8 KGS OF DRY ICE COOLING VANCOMYCIN USP 5 DEXINJ SOL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX DOES HAVE AN ORANGE STICKER INDICATING A FROZEN PRODUCT IS INSIDE DESTINED TO BE DELIVERED DIRECTLY TO THE HOSPITAL PHARMACY. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM SADDLEBROOK, NEW JERSEY USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER X69862, BAXTER CARDINAL FROZEN DC CPAD, 500 NEELYTOWN RD, MONTGOMERY NY 12549-2828.
